caption: User Inventory Info
description: For example, this can be utilized to collect user information by gathering Active Directory data.
name: user_inventory

actor.description: The actor describes the process that was the source of the inventory activity. In the case of user inventory data, that could be a particular procss or script that is run to scrape the user data. For example, it could be a powershell process that runs to pull data from the Azure AD graph API.

user.description: The user that is being discovered by an inventory process.
